trans-unit.source: Represents a compiler error or warning.
trans-unit.target: 表示编译器错误或警告。

trans-unit.source: CompilerError represents a compiler error or a warning that has been returned by the compiler.
trans-unit.target: CompilerError 表示编译器错误或已由编译器返回一个警告。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此类包含在适用于所有成员的类级别继承要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For details about inheritance demands, see [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: 有关继承要求的详细信息，请参阅[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> class using the specified file name, line, column, error number, and error text.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref>类使用指定的文件名、 行、 列、 错误号和错误文本。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the file that the compiler was compiling when it encountered the error.
trans-unit.target: 编译器遇到错误时正在编译的文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: The line of the source of the error.
trans-unit.target: 错误的源行。

trans-unit.source: The column of the source of the error.
trans-unit.target: 错误的源列。

trans-unit.source: The error number of the error.
trans-unit.target: 错误错误号。

trans-unit.source: The error message text.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column number where the source of the error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列号错误根源的出现位置。

trans-unit.source: The Column property can be set to zero for compilers that do not return column information.
trans-unit.target: 列属性可以设置为零编译器不返回列信息。

trans-unit.source: The column number of the source file where the compiler encountered the error.
trans-unit.target: 编译器遇到错误时所在的源文件列号。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error number.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置错误号。

trans-unit.source: The ErrorNumber property can contain a string of any length.
trans-unit.target: 错误号属性可以包含任意长度的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error number as a string.
trans-unit.target: 字符串形式的错误号。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置错误消息的文本。

trans-unit.source: The ErrorText property can be a string of any length.
trans-unit.target: ErrorText 属性可以是任意长度的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file name of the source file that contains the code which caused the error.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含导致错误的代码的源代码文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the source file that contains the code which caused the error.
trans-unit.target: 包含导致错误的代码的源代码文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the error is a warning.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示错误是否是一个警告。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the error is a warning; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果错误是一条警告;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line number where the source of the error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的行号错误根源的出现位置。

trans-unit.source: The line number of the source file where the compiler encountered the error.
trans-unit.target: 编译器遇到错误时所在的源文件行号。

trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of Object's <xref:System.Object.ToString*> method.
trans-unit.target: 提供的对象的实现<xref:System.Object.ToString*>方法。</xref:System.Object.ToString*>

trans-unit.source: This method is supported so <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError> objects can be treated as objects for simplified debugging output.
trans-unit.target: 支持此方法以便<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError>对象可以被视为对象，来简化调试输出。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the compiler error.
trans-unit.target: 编译器错误的字符串表示形式。
